title: Oops! Created account using same email as Main Account! What now? =(
body: Anybody please, please, if anyone can tell me how to get my account back I will love you forever. {{champion:103}} Now I can't log into my Main account and have a new account instead of my 5+ year old account with all my goodies! :( . (my main account is on NA servers, i made this EU west account to play the game with online friends :( . I just didn't know it would cause an issue at the time to be honest with you. how do i get it back?

replies.body: No worries, your account should be just where you left it!   Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team will help you locate your NA account.  We'll see you there!
